title: Sell me Champion please !!!
body:
I made a misstake i bought lucian 
in lieu of zed {{champion:238}}  and now can you delete lucian {{champion:236}}  and morgana from my account and give me 6300 ip back please please please please lol please please please pleaseee ???

replies.body: You can use a refund token per our [refund ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ)guide, as long as the purchase is within 90 days.  While no refunds can be provided past that, we can remove a champion from the account for you if absolutely necessary.  Send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your request, confirming that you are the owner of the account and that no IP would be returned for the removal of the content.  We'll respond asap!

Use your 3 refunds.
if you already used them up, sorry but you're out of luck. Plus IP is free so honestly just save up again and get him later.
